import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { increment, incrementAsync, selectCount, } from './cartSlice'; export default function Cart() { const count = useSelector(selectCount); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) return (

    {product.price}

    {product.color}

    • ))}
